rules_text:
Choose one –
• Welcome to the Ashmouth deals twice X damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Welcome to the Ashmouth deals X damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
